title: the paymner in SA
body: WE WANT OUR PAYMNET BACK OUR MOBILE PLS

replies.body: I'm not sure I have context on this specific case, but our billing team may be able to offer more clarity as well as options for methods of payment.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing guys will help individually with this.  Hang tight until then!
